title: Sound On: 2022 Democrat Agenda, Chinese Spies
itunes:title: Sound On: 2022 Democrat Agenda, Chinese Spies
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Michael Steele, former RNC Chairman and Former Lt. Governor of Maryland, Bloomberg Cyber reporter Jordan Robertson, Bill McGinley, Principal at The Vogel Group and Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino. To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
